long_description: Ideal for your home or auto emergency kit, this pocket-size Esbit stove folds down to a small, compact size. 2-position design permits a low flame for controlled cooking or a direct flame for a quicker boil time. Powered by Esbit(R) solid fuel tablets (6 included); each tablet burns for approximately 12 minutes,. Non-toxic fuel is environmentally safe, has no ash residue and is nearly odorless. Its small size and stable fuel source make this stove a great addition to your emergency preparedness kit. Additional fuel tablets sold separately.
short_description: Ideal for your home or auto emergency kit, this pocket-size Esbit stove folds down to a small, compact size.
